content.title:
Design &
Creative Leadership
content.text:
For more than a decade, I have been delivering physical and digital products through design. Today, as an executive leader, I have a goal to implement and evolve design and designers inside and outside companies.

As the founder and Chief user experience design of Fiat Chrysler Latam, i was responsible for designing worldwide products with global teams and as the Head of Products and UX at MaxMilhas i helped to create a team, process and culture of design and product, helping to build a product vision through a iterative process of discoveries and validations.

Today I am responsible for the User Experience team at Banco Inter with the responsibility to lead a great team with the challenge of building an outstanding Super App experience.

For mentoring, consulting or just to chatting about design, products and tech send me a message.
